com.vmware.connection.helpers

Class ApiValidator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.vmware.connection.helpers.BaseHelper
      • com.vmware.connection.helpers.ApiValidator

  • public class ApiValidator
extends BaseHelper
    Some samples make use of API only found on vCenter. Other samples make use of API that only make sense when used with a Host. This utility helps with determining if the proper connection has been made.
